name: Timely Defuse
description:
On an eventful Sunday morning, you discover that a group of thugs are trying to demolish a build site illegally. Guess it's up to you to stop their plans for as long as you can... preferably without getting hurt too much!

How to play

  • On a mobile device, or a computer with a touch screen, touch a position to make the protagonist move to that position.
  • Pick up dynamites before they explode.
  • Move to bombs and disarm them before they explode.
  • Don't get hit by explosions!
  • Pick up the coffee to enhance speed and reaction times.

Best played on a minimally modern mobile device with an up-to-date browser.
